summary: Depend if you think he said "get over it and then come to us" or "if you have to solve it yourself, fine, but come back to us...
question: Depend if you think he said "get over it and then come to us" or "if you have to solve it yourself, fine, but come back to us after". I read the latter. This was also after Lucas flatly told Yann its something he couldn't understand and Yann replying they'd still be there to talk if Lucas wanted. Idg the uproar over Imane either bc from my experience those "you're lucky we let you in"/honorary girl type comments to a single boy in a group of  girls is common. Even when they're het. Or older.
answer: I didn’t get it like that. But that’s a good way of looking at it. I like that a lot better. But the way the other best friends reacted was ideal… Cause they knew something else was going on but they went along with his bs. And then the cafeteria scene was a little hard cause they just having a good time without him. Idk I wouldn’t expect them to be broken hearted that he’s not there… But they were just laughing while he was going through all that in the freaking doorway. I must this boy squad ain’t my fav.

reblog.comment: I didn’t get it like that. But that’s a good way of looking at it. I like that a lot better. Idk I wouldn’t expect them to be broken hearted that he’s not there… But they were just laughing while he was going through all that in the freaking doorway. I must this boy squad ain’t my fav.

blog.name: gayshrug
blog.title: OH BOY!
blog.description: aaron | 23 | he/ him; gayness and spook @gayshrug on twitter | 28/09/17

summary: i'm currently rewatching everything and i'm still so fucked up over the fact that a) lucas immediately realised that the place...
body: i’m currently rewatching everything and i’m still so fucked up over the fact that a) lucas immediately realised that the place shown in ‘polaris’ was Real and that eliott consciously brought him there, basically inviting him to become a part of his (love) story and b) lucas had the courage to signal to eliott that he’d seen his video and remembered it all in detail, reaching out and choosing to take the place of eliott’s love interest? it must’ve been so overwhelming for him

summary: Girl I had to follow you after seeing your post cause I was like damn I’ve really let Skam France take over my tumblr blog....
question: Girl I had to follow you after seeing your post cause I was like damn I’ve really let Skam France take over my tumblr blog. Thanks for opening my eyes. 😘😘😘
answer:
There’s nothing wrong with that, though. There’s nothing wrong if you just change your blog to a Skam France blog because you love it a lot and your blog just becomes a reflection of that. As long as you’re happy with your blog, everything else is inconsequential.

But you’re welcome, ♡✨😘
